text: Edna Brown (April 7, 1940 â€“ January 1, 2022) was an American politician. She was a member of the Democratic Party. Brown was a member of the Ohio Senate from 2011 to 2018. Before, she was in the Ohio House of Representatives from 2001 to 2010. Brown was born in Toledo, Ohio. Brown died at her home in Toledo on January 1, 2022 at the age of 81.Long-time Toledo figure Edna Brown passes away at 81-years-old ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Toledo, Ohio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Edna Brown
